title: Seriously fucked up rank system..
body:
So I was B3 before the start of the season, Went 9 wins 1 loss and ended up back in B3..

WTF..

replies.body: what were you at the end of the season, they mentioned that pre-season would be almost completely no existent in the placement algorithm
Which makes me wonder why I got placed in Silver II, that is where I was at end of season, so I won 7/10 and got placed back there

> [{quoted}](name=Deche,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=pr9AmOog,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-01-25T02:17:17.387+0000)
>
> Which makes me wonder why I got placed in Silver II, that is where I was at end of season, so I won 7/10 and got placed back there

yeah i was s3 and got placed back there from 7-3 also they said it would be heavily reliant on where you ended up last season

no idea.. B4 ? still.. pretty disappointing.

Spose i just have to keep up the wins and ill be out of bronze soon..
